page.title: 17PEOPLE USING SETTLE
page.content: We went into Settle on a Wednesday in {June}to find out who was in town and why they were there. In the Autumn and the Winter there are not usually many people in town because Wednesday is the day that the shops are closed for the afternoon.{(Half-day closing) There were quite a lot of people about, and we interviewed{29, 14}of them lived in{Settle or Giggleswick. {15}of them were from{elsewhere;}from places as far appart as{London}and the {North of Scotland.}We found out that most people were in the town just to {look}at the town and the shops rather than to buy anything in particular. When we asked them what they most {liked}about the town many people picked out the market place, or simply said{"All of it".
